title: Pu`uhonua O Hōnaunau National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Pu`uhonua O Hōnaunau National Historical Park Ulana Niu (Coconut Weaving) Demonstration      Time: 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Area Fees: Park Entrance Fees Apply     Wednesday, July 27, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 12/16/2015 to 09/28/2016 Ulana Niu with Master Weaver Uncle Taro View Details             Please call the park at (808) 328-2326 ext. 1702 to confirm the events listed on this Schedule of Events Page.
